features: NEW LOOK, SAME GREAT BOWL. Dixie disposable paper bowls have a fresh, new design and the same strength to make mealtime hassle-free. During this product transition, we cannot guarantee which design you will receive; rest assured that it’s the same great bowl either way
Our strong and sturdy bowls are microwaveable, cut-resistant and feature a Soak Proof Shield, plus they’re built with Flex-Proof Technology to handle heavy, messy foods like chili, spaghetti or stews
Dixie Ultra plates and bowls are now backyard and commercially compostable
With sustainability and conservation in mind, our responsibly made products use virtually every part of the trees we process and the trees used for Dixie products are replenished
Includes 56 bowls, 20 oz disposable paper bowls (1 pack of 56 bowls)
body.description: NEW LOOK, SAME GREAT BOWL—and now commercially and backyard compostable! Serve up your favorite foods with confidence on Dixie Ultra disposable paper bowls and you won’t have to worry about bending, food spilling out or sauces soaking through. Dixie Ultra disposable bowls are also microwavable, cut resistant and have a Soak Proof Shield that’s designed to handle all types of meals. With Flex-Proof Technology built-in that can hold up to 2 lbs. of food, these paper bowls are strong enough to handle whatever you can dish out. And with their stylish designs, Dixie Ultra products are always an easy and attractive alternative to using (and washing) real dishes. Count on Dixie Ultra products when you’re entertaining family or friends or planning a special event or celebration. After all, whether you’re hosting a holiday meal, planning a party or just grilling in the backyard, you’ll appreciate the convenience and peace of mind Dixie Ultra products bring. All Dixie-branded paper bowls, cups and plates manufactured in Georgia-Pacific facilities are kosher certified by the Orthodox Union. Stock up today! If you don’t have a dedicated area in your home or backyard for composting, Dixie Ultra plates and bowls may be commercially composted if such facilities exist in your area.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dixie Ultra disposable paper bowls are built strong to handle all types of meals—from soups and stews to all your saucy sides. All of our Dixie Ultra products feature a special Soak Proof Shield to protect against anything from salad dressing to burger grease. Thanks to our patented Flex-Proof Technology, our plates and bowls are tough enough to handle even your messiest, heaviest meals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best deal with good room for soup
reviews.reviewText: I was just a bit disappointed that I refrigerated some eggs in these bowls and by the next day the bowls had become so soft, the eggs spilled over. However if you are using these for a party or one time event, they are ideal. They are the perfect size for individual servings.This has the best value for the pricePerfectly described and advertised. Was able to find them fast :)Very high qualityVery impressedItem was shipped without delay in perfect condition with no shipping logistics issue

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I won’t buy any other paper bowls - these are big enough for a stew or soup and solid. I love these. With a family of 6, these are a go-to. Saves me time with dishes and they don’t flop around and fall apart like most do. They also last/do well in the microwave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy & does not leak. Nice size for just about anything. Amazon has the best price &always arrives within the time frame given.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great bowls. Nice size. Sturdy. Leak proof.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite disposable bowls …
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using various paper products in the Dixie Ultra line for several years, and they are by far the best in terms of sturdiness and variety. These bowls are a prime example. I use them mostly for cereal and hot oatmeal, occasionally for salad and desserts. So far, nothing has ever soaked through. I always keep a pack of them on hand as they’re so useful. I also like the design: my kitchen color scheme is primarily navy blue and white, so they “fit.” Excellent product, excellent price. What’s not to like?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Work perfect for small meals. No mess, and no washing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The bowls are some of the crème de la crème of disposable dishes. They are durable, microwaveable, don’t turn gooey with use of wet products such as cereal or ice cream. I truly love these bowls. The only thing I wish was that it was in a larger pack at a better price point. Though honestly price is subjective for quality so. 🤷🏽‍♀️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good quality bowls. They hold food and liquids well. Sturdy.
